languages.text: "Хочу заметить, что его кибермастиф все еще на борту. Из-за повреждений, полученных псом на Тассере, господин Антар оставил его на попечение ваших техножрецов — я слышал, что имеет место сбой в имплантах. Служители Омниссии привели зверя в порядок, но также предупредили, что без финальной синхронизации имплантов с господином Антаром нельзя считать починку кибермастифа завершенной".

"I would like to note that his cyber-mastiff is still on board. Due to the damage the dog sustained on Thassera, Master Anthar left it in the care of your Tech-Priests. I heard there was an implant malfunction. The servants of the Omnissiah have patched up the creature, but they have also warned that a final synchronisation of its implants with those of Master Anthar is required before the cyber-mastiff can be considered fully repaired."
languages.original_text: "Хочу заметить, что его кибермастиф все еще на борту. Из-за повреждений, полученных псом на Тассере, господин Антар оставил его на попечение ваших техножрецов — я слышал, что имеет место сбой в имплантах. languages.text: 「ひとつ申し添えますと、彼のサイバーマスチフはまだ船内に残されています。タッセーラでの損傷により、マスター・アンサールはあの犬をあなたの技術司祭たちに預けました。どうやらインプラントの不具合があったようです。万機神の従者たちはあの生体機械を修復しましたが、最終的に修復完了とみなすには、マスター・アンサール本人のインプラントとの最終同期が必要だと警告しています」
languages.original_text: "I would like to note that his cyber-mastiff is still on board. Due to the damage the dog sustained on Thassera, Master Anthar left it in the care of your Tech-Priests. I heard there was an implant malfunction. The servants of the Omnissiah have patched up the creature, but they have also warned that a final synchronisation of its implants with those of Master Anthar is required before the cyber-mastiff can be considered fully repaired."

traits.locale_text: 「ひとつ申し添えますと、彼のサイバーマスチフはまだ船内に残されています。タッセーラでの損傷により、マスター・アンサールはあの犬をあなたの技術司祭たちに預けました。どうやらインプラントの不具合があったようです。万機神の従者たちはあの生体機械を修復しましたが、最終的に修復完了とみなすには、マスター・アンサール本人のインプラントとの最終同期が必要だと警告しています」

languages.text: "Lakin kendisinin siber mastifinin hâlâ gemide olduğunu belirtmek isterim. Üstat Anthar, köpeği Thassera'da almış olduğu hasar nedeniyle onarılmak üzere Tekno Rahiplerinizin bakımına bıraktı. Bir implant arızası yaşadığını duydum. Hermesih'in hizmetkârları her ne kadar yaratığı onarmış olsa da siber mastifin tam anlamıyla onarılmış sayılabilmesi için implantlarının son bir kez Üstat Anthar'ınkilerle senkronize edilmesi gerekiyormuş."
languages.original_text: "I would like to note that his cyber-mastiff is still on board. Due to the damage the dog sustained on Thassera, Master Anthar left it in the care of your Tech-Priests. I heard there was an implant malfunction. The servants of the Omnissiah have patched up the creature, but they have also warned that a final synchronisation of its implants with those of Master Anthar is required before the cyber-mastiff can be considered fully repaired."

traits.locale_text: "Lakin kendisinin siber mastifinin hâlâ gemide olduğunu belirtmek isterim. Üstat Anthar, köpeği Thassera'da almış olduğu hasar nedeniyle onarılmak üzere Tekno Rahiplerinizin bakımına bıraktı. Kendisinin bir implant arızası yaşadığını duydum. Hermesih'in hizmetkârları, her ne kadar yaratığı onarmış olsalar da siber mastifin tam anlamıyla onarılmış sayılabilmesi için implantlarının son bir kez Üstat Anthar'ınkilerle senkronize edilmesi gerektiğini ilettiler."

languages.text: «Quisiera mencionar que su cibermastín sigue a bordo. A raíz de los daños sufridos por el can en Thassera, el maestro Anthar lo dejó al cuidado de sus tecnosacerdotes. He oído que hubo un fallo técnico en algún implante. Los siervos del Omnissiah han tratado a la criatura, pero también advierten de que es necesaria una sincronización entre sus implantes y los del maestro Anthar para poder considerar plenamente reparado al cibermastín».
languages.original_text: "I would like to note that his cyber-mastiff is still on board. Due to the damage the dog sustained on Thassera, Master Anthar left it in the care of your Tech-Priests. I heard there was an implant malfunction. The servants of the Omnissiah have patched up the creature, but they have also warned that a final synchronisation of its implants with those of Master Anthar is required before the cyber-mastiff can be considered fully repaired."

traits.locale_text: «Quisiera mencionar que su cibermastín sigue a bordo. A raíz de los daños sufridos por el can en Thassera, el maestro Anthar lo dejó al cuidado de sus tecnosacerdotes. He oído que hubo un fallo técnico en algún implante. Los siervos del Omnissiah han tratado a la criatura, pero también advierten de que es necesaria una sincronización entre sus implantes y los del maestro Anthar para poder considerar plenamente reparado al cibermastín».

languages.text: “我只想提醒您一句，他的生化獒犬还在这艘船上。由于那条狗在塔瑟拉受了伤，安萨大师把它交给了您的技术神甫。我听说它的植入物出了故障，而那些欧姆尼塞亚的仆人已经把它修好了。不过，他们警告说，它的植入物必须与安萨大师的植入物进行最后同步，修复工作才算是彻底完成。”
languages.original_text: "I would like to note that his cyber-mastiff is still on board. Due to the damage the dog sustained on Thassera, Master Anthar left it in the care of your Tech-Priests. I heard there was an implant malfunction. The servants of the Omnissiah have patched up the creature, but they have also warned that a final synchronisation of its implants with those of Master Anthar is required before the cyber-mastiff can be considered fully repaired."

traits.locale_text: “我只想提醒您一句，他的生化獒犬还在这艘船上。由于那条狗在塔瑟拉受了伤，安萨大师把它交给了您的技术神甫。我听说它的植入物出了故障，而那些欧姆尼塞亚的仆人已经把它修好了。不过，他们警告说，它的植入物必须与安萨大师的植入物进行最后同步，修复工作才算是彻底完成。”

languages.text: « Je tiens à préciser que son cyber-mastiff se trouve toujours à bord. L'animal a subi d'importants dégâts sur Thassera, et son maître l'a confié aux bons soins de vos technoprêtres. Apparemment, l'un de ses implants était déficient. Les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie l'ont rafistolé, mais ils ont bien précisé qu'une dernière synchronisation avec les implants du proctor était nécessaire avant que la créature puisse être considérée comme pleinement opérationnelle. »
languages.original_text: "I would like to note that his cyber-mastiff is still on board. Due to the damage the dog sustained on Thassera, Master Anthar left it in the care of your Tech-Priests. I heard there was an implant malfunction. The servants of the Omnissiah have patched up the creature, but they have also warned that a final synchronisation of its implants with those of Master Anthar is required before the cyber-mastiff can be considered fully repaired."

traits.locale_text: « Je tiens à préciser que son cyber-mastiff se trouve toujours à bord. L'animal a subi d'importants dégâts sur Thassera, et son maître l'a confié aux bons soins de vos technoprêtres. Apparemment, l'un de ses implants était déficient. Les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie l'ont rafistolé, mais ils ont bien précisé qu'une dernière synchronisation avec les implants du proctor était nécessaire avant que la créature puisse être considérée comme pleinement opérationnelle. »

languages.text: "Ich möchte anmerken, dass sein Cyber-Mastiff noch an Bord ist. Aufgrund der Schäden, die der Hund auf Thassera erlitten hat, übergab ihn Meister Anthar der Obhut Eurer Techpriester. Wie ich höre, war eines seiner Implantate defekt. Die Diener des Omnissiah haben die Kreatur instandgesetzt, aber darauf hingewiesen, dass eine abschließende Synchronisierung ihrer Implantate mit denen von Meister Anthar erforderlich ist, ehe der Hund als vollständig repariert betrachtet werden kann."
languages.original_text: "I would like to note that his cyber-mastiff is still on board. Due to the damage the dog sustained on Thassera, Master Anthar left it in the care of your Tech-Priests. I heard there was an implant malfunction. The servants of the Omnissiah have patched up the creature, but they have also warned that a final synchronisation of its implants with those of Master Anthar is required before the cyber-mastiff can be considered fully repaired."

traits.locale_text: "Ich möchte anmerken, dass sein Cyber-Mastiff noch an Bord ist. Aufgrund der Schäden, die der Hund auf Thassera erlitten hat, übergab ihn Meister Anthar der Obhut Eurer Techpriester. Wie ich höre, war eines seiner Implantate defekt. Die Diener des Omnissiah haben die Kreatur instandgesetzt, aber darauf hingewiesen, dass eine abschließende Synchronisierung ihrer Implantate mit denen von Meister Anthar erforderlich ist, ehe der Hund als vollständig repariert betrachtet werden kann."
